com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web

Class EstimateServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.cloudera.oryx.serving.web.AbstractOryxServlet
          • com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web.AbstractALSServlet
            • com.cloudera.oryx.als.serving.web.EstimateServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public final class EstimateServlet
extends AbstractALSServlet

    Responds to a GET request to /estimate/[userID]/[itemID] and in turn calls OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String).

    Outputs the result of the method call as a value on one line.

    This servlet can also compute several estimates at once. Send a GET request to /estimate/[userID]/[itemID1](/[itemID2]/...). The output are estimates, in the same order as the item ID, one per line.

    Author:
    Sean Owen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
